name: slouchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If clothes are slouchy, they are soft and do not have a fixed stiff structure: The best slouchy dresses even have pockets for added comfort. The simple, slouchy style and good quality leather make the bag appear expensive.
standing, sitting, or walking with the shoulders hanging forward and the head bent slightly over: His posture is rather slouchy and defeated-looking. The boys all had long hair and a slouchy posture. Related word
slouch
More examplesFewer examplesThe long, slouchy tunic shapes can be worn on their own as dresses or layered over jeans.She looked as slouchy as any teenager.This summer, shops are full of slouchy dresses that are as comfortable as tracksuits.These fabrics work well with slouchy boots, or they can be dressed up with smarter high-heeled shoes.
